body_html:
Hey folks, please when introducing core changes make sure it doesn't break ONNX export. Every diff in PyTorch should have a connected PR in onnxbot/onnx-fb-universe repo (onnxbot/onnx-fb-universe#145 in this case) and it has the build status. Please kindly check it before accepting the diff.

On the side we should look at how to make it a blocking check explicitly.

On the side we should look at how to make it a blocking check explicitly.
body:
Hey folks, please when introducing core changes make sure it doesn't break ONNX export. Every diff in PyTorch should have a connected PR in onnxbot/onnx-fb-universe repo (https://github.com/onnxbot/onnx-fb-universe/pull/145 in this case) and it has the build status. Please kindly check it before accepting the diff.

On the side we should look at how to make it a blocking check explicitly.
